inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin level is at least 8 g / dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Disabling Pulmonary Disease and History of Asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe kidney disease; Creatinine level greater than 2mg/dl; Proteinuria
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The SGOT level more than 3 times of the normal threshold
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive history of hypersensitivity to saffron, rose water and honey
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency and frequency. She has no history of recurrent UTI prior to her pregnancy or any other underlying disease.
